sources.title: Went The Day Well?
sources.description: The residents of a British village during WWII welcome a platoon of soldiers who are to be billeted with them. The trusting residents then discover that the soldiers are Germans who proceed to hold the village captive.

metadata.Plot: The residents of a British village during WWII welcome a platoon of soldiers who are to be billeted with them. The trusting residents then discover that the soldiers are Germans who proceed to hold the village captive.
metadata.Writer: Graham Greene, John Dighton, Diana Morgan
metadata.Actors: Leslie Banks, C.V. France, Valerie Taylor
